name: Augmenta
body:
Augmenta ======== Augmenta is a combination of hardware (multiple 3D cameras, dedicated computers and a server computer) and software (Image analysis, data fusion, tools, etc.) which provides the position of every person or object in scene via OSC, along with other useful data.

Augmenta workshops from THÉORIZ on Vimeo.

[Getting started] [Video]: https://vimeo.com/12649341 [Getting started]: https://github.com/Theoriz/Augmenta/wiki [Th√©oriz studio]: http://www.theoriz.com/
